title: Zamorak chaps

properties.name: description
properties.value: Zamorak chaps are Ranged armour aligned with Zamorak. 70 Ranged is required to wear these chaps. It has the exact same offensive stats as a black dragonhide chaps, except for a +1 prayer bonus, and more defensive bonuses. Players can receive them as a reward from completing hard Treasure Trails.

Advanced data
Item ID10372

Zamorak chaps are Ranged armour aligned with Zamorak. 70 Ranged is required to wear these chaps. It has the exact same offensive stats as a black dragonhide chaps, except for a +1 prayer bonus, and more defensive bonuses. Players can receive them as a reward from completing hard Treasure Trails.

This item does give Zamorakian protection within the God Wars Dungeon.

 Attack bonuses
+0+0+0-10+17
 Defence bonuses
+31+25+33+28+31
 Other bonusesSlot
+0+0+0%+1List

Changes[edit | edit source]

Date Changes
22 September 2021
(update)

The 40 Defence requirement has been removed.

18 June 2015
(update)

Fixed a stretching issue with void robes and dragonhide chaps whilst using Zul-andra teleport.

27 March 2014
(update | poll)

Now gives a +1 Prayer bonus.

[[File:Zamorak chaps detail.png|left|90px]]
'''Zamorak chaps''' are [[Ranged armour]] aligned with [[Zamorak]]. 70 [[Ranged]] is required to wear these chaps. It has the exact same offensive stats as a [[black dragonhide chaps]], except for a +1 [[prayer bonus]], and more defensive bonuses. Players can receive them as a reward from completing [[Clue scroll (hard)|hard]] [[Treasure Trails]].

This item '''does''' give [[God Wars Dungeon#God%20equipment|Zamorakian protection]] within the [[God Wars Dungeon]].
